Definition: Index for individual estimate of a natural unit's biovolume

Values or range: ANSP, CBFS.Oneida, CBFS.Onondaga, BDMA.1993-2007, BDMA.2008-2012, NTL.LTER, REBECCA

Definition: Sampling location as reported in original data source
Date of biovolume sample, from original data source (when reported)
Sample ID from original data source
Taxa name reported in source data.
Taxonomic ID code from original data source
Taxa name, combining genus or genus + species names from original data source.

Values or range: Cell, Cell-Motile, Cell-Nonmotile, Colonial-Motile, Colonial-Nonmotile, Complex-Filament, Filament, Lateral-Filament, Multi-Filament, palmeloid stage

Definition: Biovolume corresponding to a natural unit of the specified taxa
Biovolume of an individual cell of the specified taxa (which may be the same as a natural unit)
